body.name: Portable Handheld Iron, Electric Steam Ironing Machine For Dress Shirt Travel 180°Rotatable Handheld Steam Iron, Small Size Ironing Machine Fabric Wrinkle Remover Ironing
features: 【180° Rotatable Design】This handheld steam iron comes with a 180° rotatable handle, which provides flexible ironing angles to meet your specific needs. The handle can be adjusted to 0°, 90° or 180° angle for a comfortable grip when ironing.

【Fast and Gentle Heating】This iron offers both dry and wet ironing capabilities. Equipped with a titanium soleplate, this iron heats up quickly and maintains a constant temperature of 302°F. It effectively irons clothes without causing any damage or burns.
【Water Tank】The hidden water tank of this iron has a capacity of 20ml. Simply open the 𝗍𝖺𝗇𝗄 cover and add water using a water bottle. The water level is visible at all times for convenient refilling.

【Wet and Dry Ironing】This mini ironing machine is designed for wet and dry ironing. It features large titanium plates that can be used to dry wet areas of clothing, giving you a variety of efficient ironing options. The bottom is designed to maintain a constant temperature, ensuring it works with a variety of fabrics silk, plush, wool, cotton, linen, polyester and brocade.

【Portable Mini Ironing Machine】This upgraded handheld steam iron is compact and foldable, making it perfect for both home and travel use. Its mini size of 21.6x8.5cm/8.5x3.34in ensures easy storage and portability. It easily fits into luggage and backpacks, allowing you to keep your clothes tidy and presentable wherever you go.
